name: Death Thread
description:
Death Thread is a 2D pixel game in which you, as a beetle, have to overcome an obstacle course through several layers of a cave before you can escape. On your way out you have to face sharp-edged spikes, trap doors and small spider opponents. But beware: Time is ticking! If you are not fast enough you will be eaten by the big spider queen.

Credits:

  • Emilia Bornschlegl
  • Magdalena Elender
  • Veronika Frei
  • River Gadermaier
  • Celine Pham
  • Dominik Senzenberger
